explanation: Agent A is correct. The if (1) in MHD_digest_auth_get_username has an invariant controlling expression (constant true) which is not one of the allowed exceptions of MISRA C 2023 Rule 14.3 (the exceptions allow invariant expressions only for infinite loops or the special do-while false pattern). Therefore the construct violates Rule 14.3. The intended purpose (introducing a nested scope for local variables) should be achieved without using an if with a constant condition; replace if (1) { ... } with a plain compound statement { ... } or otherwise restructure the code to avoid an invariant controlling expression.
